name: Wickless Recruitment
overrideDescription: Remove all [burnout] and [debuff] effects from a unit.

additionalTooltips.title: Debuff
additionalTooltips.description: Debuff effects are generally negative for their target and are represented by red icons.

cardLoreTooltips: Initiation into the Wickless Remains is a rite performed in the underbelly of the Waxen Arches, involving the sacrifice of a Waxerâ€™s wick to forever tie them to their hellish homeland. Even after the many I've witnessed, the ritual still gives me pause.
